home.description: With a Master's in Software Engineering from MIT and a passion for innovative technology, I'm eager to contribute to cutting-edge projects and drive impactful solutions in the tech industry.

about.description: I'm Alex Johnson, a dedicated software engineer with a focus on AI and machine learning. My journey through the world of tech has been marked by relentless learning and the drive to apply my skills in real-world scenarios, especially in the field of AI-driven technologies.
